column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It will take a long time to get your pie
column2: because it takes a long time to cook
column3: but you can pre-order at the hostess stand so that when you are seated
column4: all they have to do is put it in the oven.  Even so
column6: don't come here.  If you have time to enjoy a special meal with family and friends
